CodeList.Title: UNCL5305 Duty or tax or fee category code

Code.Name: Vat Reverse Charge
Code.Description: Code specifying that the standard VAT rate is levied from the invoicee.

Code.Name: Exempt from Tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that taxes are not applicable.

Code.Name: Zero rated goods
Code.Description: Code specifying that the goods are at a zero rate.

Code.Name: Higher rate
Code.Description: Code specifying a higher rate of duty or tax or fee.

Code.Name: Lower rate
Code.Description: Tax rate is lower than standard rate.
